title: WB Page — site page shell
description: Canonical site page wrapper that provides the default header, main and footer structure and consumes site tokens/behaviors.
notes: Use direct child elements (<header>, <main>, <footer>) — HTML slots are deprecated. `wb-page` will set the site default theme to 'dark' when no author theme is present; authors should NOT set `data-theme` on <html> for pages using `wb-page`.
